title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in thousand units, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Market size in thousand units has increased over the Year.
Market size in thousand units is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2008, and lastly roughly constant from 2008 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Max Market size in thousand units about 51600.0 was recorded at Year 2014
Min Market size in thousand units about 12963.0 was recorded at Year 2005
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in thousand units, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2009 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2005 to 2008.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2009.
